summary: This is an email from a US Department of Justice email address, forwarding or referencing a New York Daily News article about Attorney General William Barr being questioned regarding Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate. The document appears to be internal DOJ correspondence about media coverage.

persons.name: William Barr
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line of a forwarded news article about being questioned regarding Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the subject line of a news article about his cellmate and Attorney General Barr being questioned.

events.title: NY Daily News Article on Barr Questioned About Epstein Cellmate
events.description: A New York Daily News article is published reporting that Attorney General William Barr was questioned about Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate.

events.title: DOJ Email Forwarding Article
events.description: An email is sent from a US Department of Justice email address referencing the New York Daily News article about Barr and Epstein's cellmate.

keyFacts: The document is an internal DOJ email dated January 5, 2021.
The email references a New York Daily News article from January 4, 2021, with the headline about Attorney General William Barr being questioned regarding Jeffrey Epstein's cellmate.
The email originates from a US Department of Justice email address (usa.doj.gov).
The subject matter indicates ongoing media and potentially internal scrutiny regarding the circumstances of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.
